product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Camp Chair - Special Buy
long_description: The sturdy, collapsible ALPS Mountaineering Camp Chair has armrests and a padded seat for deluxe comfort in camp, on the beach or in the back yard. Durable aluminum tubing and rugged 600-denier polyester material; curved armrests feature closed-cell foam padding. Designed to fold flat for storage and open quickly; sturdy steel connectors at joints handle heavy use. Connecting bars between the legs allow better stability on loose, sandy surfaces. Special buy.
short_description: The sturdy, collapsible ALPS Mountaineering Camp Chair has armrests and a padded seat for deluxe comfort in camp, on the beach or in the back yard.
